products.name: Classic Leather Dog Collar
products.description: Handcrafted genuine leather dog collar with brass hardware for durability and style.

products.name: Reflective Safety Collar
products.description: High-visibility reflective collar with quick-release buckle for nighttime safety and everyday use.

products.name: Floral Pattern Designer Collar
products.description: Stylish cotton collar with beautiful floral pattern, perfect for fashionable pups.

products.name: Waterproof Adventure Collar
products.description: Odor-resistant, waterproof collar designed for outdoor adventures and active dogs.

products.name: Personalized Embroidered Collar
products.description: Custom embroidered nylon collar with your dog's name and your phone number for identification.

products.name: Bowtie Formal Collar
products.description: Elegant collar with removable bowtie accessory, perfect for special occasions and formal events.

products.name: Premium Leather Leash
products.description: Matching premium leather leash with comfortable padded handle for extended walks.

products.name: Retractable Training Leash
products.description: 16-foot retractable leash with one-button lock mechanism for training and variable distance control.

products.name: Reflective Running Leash
products.description: Hands-free running leash with reflective stitching and waist attachment for active dog owners.

products.name: Double Dog Walking Leash
products.description: Dual-dog leash with tangle-free design, perfect for walking two dogs simultaneously.

products.name: Shock-Absorbing Bungee Leash
products.description: Elastic bungee leash that reduces pulling strain and provides shock absorption for comfortable walks.

products.name: Heavy-Duty Training Lead
products.description: Extra-long 30-foot training lead for recall training and outdoor exploration in open spaces.
